remarks: In geometries of dimension lower than 2, all points are colinear. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Aug-2019.)
statement:
tgdim01.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
tgdim01.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tgdim01.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. V ) $.
tgdim01.1 $e |- ( ph -> -. G TarskiGDim>= 2 ) $.
tgdim01.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. P ) $.
tgdim01.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. P ) $.
tgdim01.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. P ) $.
tgdim01 $p |- ( ph -> ( Z e. ( X I Y ) \/ X e. ( Z I Y ) \/ Y e. ( X I Z ) ) ) $.
